item.title: 北爱尔兰评估特朗普与欧盟贸易战的风险
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战有可能给北爱尔兰带来新的脱欧创伤。【原文：Donald Trump’s trade war is threatening to open fresh Brexit wounds in Northern Ireland.】

item.title: ADP 数据显示美国企业新增就业岗位 18.3 万个，高于预期
item.description: 1 月份美国公司的就业人数增幅超过预期，凸显出尽管不确定性不断增加，但就业增长仍具有韧性。【原文：Employment at US companies picked up in January by more than forecast, highlighting resilient job growth despite mounting uncertainty.】

item.title: 丹麦将加强对俄罗斯影子舰队油轮的审查
item.description: 丹麦将加强对通过其狭窄海峡运输俄罗斯石油的船只的检查，以保护环境和海上安全，防止莫斯科影子船队中的老旧船只对环境造成影响。【原文：Denmark will ramp up inspections of ships transporting Russian oil through its narrow straits, in an effort to protect the environment and maritime safety from older vessels in Moscow’s shadow fleet.】

item.title: DeepSeek 的忧虑仍在持续，Arm 的 "怪物 "估值面临考验
item.description: 自 DeepSeek 引发人们对人工智能设备支出前景的担忧以来，Arm Holdings Plc 的表现好于大多数半导体股。【原文：Arm Holdings Plc has fared better than most semiconductor stocks in the days since DeepSeek sparked concerns about the outlook for spending on artificial intelligence gear — but its steep valuation leaves it with plenty to prove.】

item.title: 阿波罗计划建立首个私人信贷市场
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is seeking to build a marketplace that would allow investors to buy and sell high-grade private assets more easily, while encroaching further into terrain once dominated by the biggest Wall Street firms.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦大亨正在商谈向国家支付 10 亿美元的事宜
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦最富有的人之一正在商谈向国家支付约 10 亿美元，作为政府对该国首任总统时期积累的财富进行调查的一部分。【原文：One of Kazakhstan’s richest men is in talks to pay about $1 billion to the state as part of a government investigation into wealth accumulated under the country’s first president.】

item.title: 美国威胁贸易，加拿大寻求更多途径向中国运输石油
item.description: 自加拿大跨山输油管扩建工程于今年 5 月竣工以来，几乎每天都有一艘满载油砂原油的油轮从温哥华狮门大桥下驶过，前往太平洋周边的炼油厂。【原文：Almost every day since the expansion of Canada’s Trans Mountain pipeline was completed in May, a tanker laden with oil sands crude shipped through the line has passed under Vancouver’s Lions Gate Bridge en route to refineries around the Pacific.】

item.title: 俄罗斯一月份石油预算收入接近一年最低水平
item.description: 由于全球原油价格疲软以及对国家炼油厂的支付增加，俄罗斯 1 月份国家预算中的石油收入接近一年来的最低水平。【原文：Russia’s proceeds from oil in the state budget in January were near a one-year low due to weaker global crude prices and higher payouts to the nation’s refiners.】

item.description:

item.title: 杜克大学的 Cam Harvey 称投资组合再平衡的成本高达 160 亿美元
item.description: 在华尔街这个急功近利的时代，这是一个公开的秘密：投资者像上了发条一样按部就班地调整自己的股票和债券投资组合，却受制于 "快钱 "投机者的 "跑马圈地"。【原文：It’s an open secret in this need-for-speed era on Wall Street: Investors, who adjust their stock-bond portfolios like clockwork on regular schedules, are at the mercy of front-running by fast-money speculators.】

item.title: 波兰延长利率暂停期，经济岌岌可危
item.description: 波兰中央银行将其稳定利率期延长至第 16 个月，经济增长的预期反弹增加了行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）反对降息的理由。【原文：Poland’s central bank extended its period of stable interest rates into 16th month with an expected rebound in economic growth adding to Governor Adam Glapinski’s arguments against the need for cuts.】

item.title: Neuberger Berman 将从 Fintech 购买 10 亿美元消费债务
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，Neuberger Berman 集团将在未来几年内从消费贷款机构 ClarityPay 购入多达 10 亿美元的贷款，这标志着这家金融技术初创公司达成了最大的购买协议。【原文：Neuberger Berman Group is buying as much as $1 billion of loans from consumer lender ClarityPay over the course of the next few years, marking the largest purchase agreement for the financial technology startup, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 奈拉表现持续稳定，尼日利亚扩大美元使用范围
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行已将外汇局的美元准入期限延长了四个月，因为当地流动性的改善促进了奈拉近期的上涨。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank has extended the dollar access of foreign exchange bureaus by four months, amid improved local liquidity that has contributed to recent naira gains.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团首席执行官称马里矿业发展令人严重关切
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）首席执行官邓肯-万布拉德（Duncan Wanblad）表示，马里政府对采掘业的全面改革有可能阻碍企业在这个拥有世界第二大金矿的国家投资。【原文：The Malian government’s overhaul of its extraction industry risks deterring companies from investing in the nation that’s home to the world’s second-largest gold mine, according to Anglo American Plc Chief Executive Officer Duncan Wanblad.】

item.title: 特朗普希望美国建立主权财富基金。它们是什么？
item.description: 主权财富基金是世界上最强大、最神秘的投资者之一，据估计其账户中的资金超过 13 万亿美元。主权财富基金由许多国家的政府实体管理，以开出金融界最大的支票而闻名，偶尔也会引发巨大的丑闻。【原文：Sovereign wealth funds are some of the most powerful — and secretive — investors in the world, with more than $13 trillion estimated to be in their accounts. Run by government entities in a wide variety of countries, they’re known to write the biggest checks in finance and have occasionally been the source of enormous scandal.】

item.title: 美国关税延迟引发北美 30 天抢购潮
item.description: 虽然唐纳德-特朗普总统已搁置了对加拿大和墨西哥的关税威胁，但制造商们并不抱任何侥幸心理。【原文：While President Donald Trump has put his tariff threats against Canada and Mexico on hold, manufacturers aren’t taking any chances.】

item.title: 英国将允许在更多地方建造核电站

item.title: 华丽七侠增长放缓，威胁 S&P 500 指数反弹
item.description: 上周，DeepSeek 作为人工智能威胁的出现使英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.昨晚，Alphabet 公司令人失望的财报引发了对其资本支出的质疑，并使其股价出现了一年多来最严重的下跌。【原文：Last week, DeepSeek’s emergence as an AI threat wiped half a trillion dollars of value off Nvidia Corp. item.title: 默克停产加卫苗显示大片疫苗在中国的窘境
item.description: 默克公司（Merck & Co.去年，加卫苗在中国的需求曾一度飙升，但很快就萎缩了，以至于这家美国制药巨头在本周早些时候呼吁停止发货。【原文：Merck & Co.’s blockbuster vaccine Gardasil has had a roller-coaster ride in China. item.title: 瑞士监管机构 Finma 反对瑞银关于竞争力的诉求
item.description: 瑞士金融监管机构首席执行官表示，他正在顶住压力，将瑞银集团与全球同行的竞争力作为其监管方法中的一个明确因素。【原文：The chief executive of Switzerland’s financial regulator signaled that he’s resisting pressure to accept the competitiveness of UBS Group AG against its global peers as an explicit factor in its approach to supervision.】

item.title: 降息在即，挪威房价创2022年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 随着抵押贷款规定的放宽和央行降息预期的启动，挪威调整后的住房价格以三年来最快的速度增长。【原文：Norway’s adjusted home prices grew at the fastest pace in three years as a loosening of mortgage rules and an expected start to the central bank’s interest-rate cuts spurred demand.】

item.title: 交易员对贸易战风险进行定价，美元加速下滑
item.description: 美元对几乎所有主要货币都下跌了，因为交易员们继续对即将爆发全面贸易战的风险进行定价。【原文：The dollar fell against almost all major currencies as traders continued to price out the risk of an imminent full blown trade war.】

item.title: 南非商业情绪跌至 2021 年骚乱以来最低水平
item.description: 2021 年 7 月，南非发生了致命的骚乱、抢劫和纵火事件，供应链中断，产出减少。【原文：An index measuring South African business conditions slumped to the lowest level since July 2021, when deadly riots, looting and arson disrupted supply chains and curtailed output.】

item.title: Natixis 称法国 2024 年赤字可能低于预期
item.description: Natixis 经济学家表示，法国的财政困难可能没有预测的那么严重，因为数据显示去年国家中央财政赤字有所减少。【原文：France’s fiscal difficulties may not be as acute as forecast, Natixis economists said after data showed a smaller central state deficit last year.】
